data.eml:eml: Two new species of Sphaeromopsis (Crustacea: Isopoda: Sphaeromatidae) from the Persian Gulf

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Khalaji-Pirbalouty, Valiallah, Wägele, Johann-Wolfgang (2009): Two new species of Sphaeromopsis (Crustacea: Isopoda: Sphaeromatidae) from the Persian Gulf. Zootaxa 2305: 33-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275370
